        public static int randomIntInRange(int min,
                   int max)
        Generates a random number in range [min max]
        Parameters:
        min - The lowest possible value inclusive of the random number generated
        max - The highest possible value inclusive of the random number generated
        Returns:
        The random number in range [min max]

        Checks if an email address correctly formatted
        Parameters:
        email - The email address to be validated
        Returns:
        Returns true if the address format valid else false Note only formate validated, not existence of address
